properties.description: Bulk copy data from cogni schema
This pipeline will copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: ListObjectsFromOneGroup
activities.description: List objects from one group and iterate each of them to downstream activities

activities.name: RouteJobsBasedOnLoadingBehavior
activities.description: Check the loading behavior for each object if it requires full load or incremental load. If it is Default or FullLoad case, do full load. If it is DeltaLoad case, do incremental load.

activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

activities.name: GetMaxWatermarkValue
activities.description: Query the source object to get the max value from watermark column

activities.name: DeltaLoadOneObject
activities.description: Copy the changed data only from last time via comparing the value in watermark column to identify changes.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).schema}].[@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).table}] 
    where [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] > @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, 
    concat('''', json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, ''''))}
    and [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] <= @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, 
    concat('''', activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, ''''))}

defaultActivities.name: DefaultFullLoadOneObject
defaultActivities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

sources.name: Emp1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Emp1

sources.name: Emp1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Emp1

sources.name: Dept
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Dept

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Emp1 = let AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://dl482891.dfs.core.windows.net/source/emp.csv"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(PromotedHeaders, {{"did", Int64.Type}, {"empid", Int64.Type}}) in  #"Changed column type";
shared Dept = let AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://dl482891.dfs.core.windows.net/source/dept.csv"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(PromotedHeaders, {{"did", Int64.Type}, {"revenue", Int64.Type}}) in  #"Changed column type";
shared UserQuery = let Source = #"Emp1",
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(Source, {"empid"}),
  #"Inserted merged column" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed duplicates", "Eid-Did", each Text.Combine({Text.From([empid]), Text.From([did])}, "-"), type text),
  #"Capitalized each word" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Inserted merged column", {{"empname", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}}),
  #"Trimmed text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Capitalized each word", {{"empname", each Text.Trim(_), type nullable text}}),
  #"Inserted text length" = Table.AddColumn(#"Trimmed text", "Length", each Text.Length([#"Eid-Did"]), type number),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Inserted text length", {{"Length", "EIDDIDLen"}}),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Renamed columns", {"did"}, Dept, {"did"}, "Dept", JoinKind.Inner),
  #"Expanded Dept" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "Dept", {"dname", "revenue"}, {"dname", "revenue"}) in #"Expanded Dept";
